Every Dog Deserves a Home

At Paw-Pact, we truly believe every dog deserves a chance at love and happiness. Behind every wagging tail is a story—some filled with hardship, others shaped by change and uncertainty. But they all share one thing in common: they’re searching for a loving forever home. A place to be seen, to be loved, to give love in return, and to finally live life to the fullest. Whether you’re a first-time dog owner or welcoming another companion into your family, we’re here to help you find your next partner in life.

Meet your new best friend

Bruno

Bruno is a gentle giant in the making! He is playful, super cuddly, and loves to explore the outdoors. He can be a little shy at first, but given some time and care, he will burst out of his shell. Bruno will need a family ready for big dog adventures.

Cali

Cali is super smart and full of energy! She thrives on activity and would love an active home with space to run. She's great with children and will be the in the thick of all the action. She loves to play fetch and learn new tricks.

Loki

Loki is a calm, affectionate boy who love a good nap on the couch after a walk. He's gentle, quiet, and adapts well to home life. Loki is a dream to walk on the lead and loves to be in nature. He would do best in a quiet, peaceful home where he can relax and feel safe.

Penny

Penny is a sweet, easy-going elderly lady who loves affection and short walks. She loves to be brushed and will happily stay by your side for cuddles. Penny needs a quiet home so she can relax and enjoy a nice peaceful life.

Dexter

Dexter is loyal and full of heart. He loves to be with people, whether that's on a hike, or on the couch. He is just happy to be a part of a group. Dexter is looking for a family that will embrace him with open arms, in return, he will open his heart.

Toby

Toby is bright, active, and very eager to learn! This clever little guy loves to play and has excellent problem solving skills. He is full of personality and would excel in a home with space to run. Toby is from a long line of working dogs, so he needs someone with experience in how to handle active working breeds.
